tasks.name: Title Case Converter
tasks.desc: Makes sure all Name properties on Cards begin with an uppercase letter.
tasks.query: MATCH (c:Card) WHERE c.Name =~ $nameregex WITH c, left(c.Name, 1) as firstLetter, right(c.Name, length(c.Name)-1) as rest SET c.Name = (toUpper(firstLetter) + rest) RETURN c
